title: Ranking the NBA's five best rim protectors
text: Ranking the NBA's five best rim protectors Friday, 9 October 2015 (3 minutes ago) Some say the center is an artifact of a bygone era in the NBA. But these big guys have turned defending the rim into an art form. These are the top five rim protectors in the league. The NBA is a scorer's league -- except when these guys are on the job. Here are the top five on-ball defenders headed into the 2015-16 NBA season. FOX Sports 1 day ago - Sports There are those who believe the 3-point shot is ruining the NBA. To those people, we ask the following: Are you watching the games? FOX Sports 2 days ago - Sports Dunks are great. 3-pointers are fantastic, too. But there's something truly special about a picture-perfect pocket pass or a no-look dime that leaves a defense...
